Changes.Change: Added a check if the date field is left blank attempt to use the current system date.
Added error prevention to button event handlers on the dev tools form.
Nullified exception objcets in listbox keypress events region on the dev tools form to save memory.
Added an else statement if only one password box is empty on the setup form to display a message to the user.
Added an error message on fail of key deletion on the settings form.
Added critical error messages to the save and load db functions on the settings form.
Added critical error message to the db load function on the main password form.

Revisions.Revision: Added font,bg,fg,button and reset buttons to the settings form for visual changes.
Added Summaries for intellicode to all objects within the serialization wrapper classes for the changelog serializer.
Removed unneeded keymanager references on form 1.
Added summaries for all functions on form1 for intellicode.
Removed unneeded keymanager references on the settings form.
Added summaries for all functions on the settings form for intellicode.
Added summaries for all functions on the setup form for intellicode.
Added summaries for all functions on the serial key center form for intellicode.
Added summaries for all functions on the serial key settins form for intellicode.

BugFixes.BugFix: Fixed a bug where the build element attributes were not being properly added to the xml output.
Fixed a bug where the build element was being called builder by the xml serializer.

Features.Feature: Added a changelog xml generator to the devtools pane.

Changes.Change: Removed the Function CaluclateHash definition from every class and added it to the EncryptionWrapper class.

Features.Feature: Added a new manager for Serial Keys.
Added a settings tool for the serial key manager.

Revisions.Revision: Added Summaries for intellicode to all functions within the encryption wrapper class.

BugFixes.BugFix: Fixed an error where a crash would occur due to a null reference exception in the Encryption Wrapper if it was initialized without a key value.
